You should to reapair kitty-bot, we will go soon" nd turned his head 
to Aerotaur "Nightlight, still is missin"



In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> Whines,"But I don't wanna go back to the ship. I wanna stay here 
and 
> be with my new friend. He's scared and I don't want him to be 
scared 
> of us. We're not scarey bots."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> > ::Aerotaur::
> >       "Trinity be careful we don't know if he'll be violent.  
> However I think 
> > you should come with us little squirrel.  What is your name?"  He 
> realizes 
> > that Windlord is still holding him.  "I think you can let him go 
> that daggar 
> > won't do much damage to either of us however, Trinity you should 
> take Zeni
